ucdxml:block:
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Cat { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA)-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{3}" } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Core { "C" | "L" | "N" }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Desc { xsd:string { pattern='[^\t"]+'} }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Func { xsd:string { pattern='[^\t"]+'} }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_FVal { text }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_UniK { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA|NL|NU)[0-9]{3}[A-Z]{0,2}|HJ ([A-IK-Z]|AA)[0-9]{3}[A-Z]{0,2}" } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_JSesh { list { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|Aa|NL|NU|Ff)[0-9]{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,5}|(US1|US22|US248|US685)([A-IK-Z]|Aa|NL|NU)[0-9]{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,5}" }+ } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_HG { list { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA)[0-9]{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,2}" }+ } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_IFAO { list { xsd:string { pattern="[0-9]{1,3},[0-9]{1,2}" }+ } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_NoMirror { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_NoRotate { boolean }?
